word: G1911 - ἐπιβάλλω - epibállō - ep-ee-bal'-lo - Beat into

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - இணை, கை போடு, மோது, நீட்டு
1. to cast upon, to put (sew) on
2. to throw oneself upon, rush upon
3. Impersonally, it belongs to me, falls to my share

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G1909 and G906; to throw upon (literally or figuratively, transitively or reflexively; usually with more or less force); specifically (with G1438 implied) to reflect; impersonally to belong to: - beat into, cast (up-), on, fall, lay (on), put (unto), stretch forth, think on.
Cognate: G1544, G1911, G906
